text: ยง 11-215 Entry of corrections made by tax commission. Upon receiving notice of a correction of an assessment made by the tax commission, the commissioner of finance shall cause the amount of the assessment as corrected to be entered upon the proper books of annual record and the assessment-rolls for the year for which such correction is made.

chapter.text: REAL PROPERTY ASSESSMENT, TAXATION AND CHARGES

heading.catch_text: Entry of corrections made by tax commission.
